featured.text: In the 16th and 17th centuries, treasures from the Far East were carried along the road into the capital cities of Europe.

definition.zh_def: 東方；指地球的東側或朝向東方的方向。
definition.en_def: The direction toward the point of the horizon 90 degrees clockwise from north; one of the four cardinal directions.
definition.example: The sun rises in the east.
